X FACTOR boss Simon Cowell is trying to entice Britain's top voiceover man to America. Booming Peter Dickson , 49, is familiar to millions of fans for telling nervous contestants: It's time... to face... the music! Now Simon Cowell wants him to deliver his sound on the talent show's American version from the autumn. Peter Dickson , who also does Britain's Got Talent, Family Fortunes, The Paul O'Grady Show,
